title: L&K Announces the Commencement of an Investigation Involving Possible Breaches of Fiduciary Duty by the Board of ORBCOMM, Inc. -- ORBC
text: L&K Announces the Commencement of an Investigation Involving Possible Breaches of Fiduciary Duty by the Board of ORBCOMM, Inc. -- ORBC   Published on 2015-10-19 16:45:02 ORBC SHAREHOLDER ALERT: L&K Announces the Commencement of an Investigation Involving Possible... -- NEW YORK, Oct. 19,   Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Levi & Korsinsky, LLP <-  <- stripped tags -> NEW YORK , Oct. 19,   Levi & Korsinsky, LLP announces that it has commenced an investigation of ORBCOMM, Inc. (Nasdaq: [[]]) concerning possible breaches of fiduciary duty by the Board of Directors. To obtain additional information about our investigation, please go to : [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTk2YkdzdU9XNXNMbU52YlM5dmNtSmpYQ0lnY21Wc1BWd2libTltYjJ4c2IzZGNJaUIwWVhKblpYUTlYQ0pmWW14aGJtdGNJajVvZEhSd09pOHZlbXhyTGpsdWJDNWpiMjB2YjNKaVl6d3ZZVDQ9fA==]] or contact Joseph E. Levi, Esq. at: [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW0xaGFXeDBienBxYkdWMmFVQjZiR3N1WTI5dFhDSWdjbVZzUFZ3aWJtOW1iMnhzYjNkY0lpQjBZWEpuWlhROVhDSmZZbXhoYm10Y0lqNXFiR1YyYVVCNmJHc3VZMjl0UEM5aFBnPT18]], (212) 363-7500, or toll-free: (877) 363-5972. Levi & Korsinsky is a national firm with offices in New York , New Jersey , Connecticut and Washington D.C recognized for its excellence in representing shareholders of various kinds. The firm's attorneys have extensive expertise in prosecuting securities litigation involving financial fraud, representing investors throughout the nation in securities and shareholder lawsuits. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes. CONTACT:
